author: smilek
msg: added support for moving layout fragments

author: smilek
msg: removed support for desktop-themes and added support to retrieve decorations (portlet and layout) which support jetspeed desktop

author: hlship
msg: Support return values from activate event handler methods.  The return value is a "navigational result" (a page instance or page name, etc.).

author: jboynes
msg: update runtime module to new parent/kernel version
